Kieran Gibbs: "I've been at the club for a long time so it's an honour to be part of the group of players to have led the team out."

Arsène Wenger’s Christmas holidays have been disrupted by football for the past 20 years, but you won’t hear him complaining about it.

The manager and his family have had to adapt to the English football calendar since he arrived at Arsenal in 1996 but Wenger wouldn’t want to be anywhere else.

“It’s where I want to be,” he told Arsenal Player. “The Christmas period is a present period and for me my present is to be in football.

“That’s what I wanted in my life, so I personally am on a permanent Christmas! Apart from the results when they don’t go well, the rest is happiness to be where I wanted to spend my life.

“Unfortunately the families have always suffered from my passion but we try to compensate outside of the games, but I believe as well we are in such a privileged position because you can give some happiness to people who love the game.

“I feel always that families who are together at Christmas - that’s not happening a lot during the year when the families aren’t together - and for them to enjoy a game of their favourite club over the Christmas period is the least we can do.”

巴黎聖日耳門（PSG）此前已經兩次邀請阿仙奴領隊雲格，希望法國教授可以成為他們的新主帥，但教授都一一拒絕。不過，PSG並未因此而死心，反而第3次向雲格邀請，希望教授改變初衷。目前，阿仙奴在英超排名又回到最熟識的第4位，廠迷會否對教授的耐性已到極限，可能在季後浮現，尤其歐聯抽籤遇上拜仁慕尼黑，要爭標並不容易，故PSG再以誠意打動明年便約滿阿仙奴的教授。

Crystal Palace F.C. have today asked Alan Pardew to step down as Manager of the Club.

Club Chairman Steve Parish said, “I would like to put on record our sincere gratitude for the tremendous service Alan has given us, both in his time here as Manager and previously as a player. Following a fantastic second half of 2014/15, the 2015/16 season culminated in only narrowly missing out on winning the FA cup as well as securing our Premier League place for a record breaking fourth time. During his tenure Alan’s hard work and dedication were without question, he has improved so many areas of the Club and we wish him the very best for the future.

With games now coming thick and fast over the holiday period the Club are hoping to put someone in place as quickly as possible but have nothing to say about a replacement at this time.

“There are of course phases in the game where the line becomes blurred, but then you need to step up psychologically,” he told Arsenal Player. “I play with a lot of emotion because I’m a passionate guy and I play with that passion.

“I love playing that way. Sometimes you’re late onto the ball, sometimes you’re not. Sometimes you make contact with the guy when you tackle him, sometimes not. It’s a sport where individual duels are vital so I don’t see it as a problem.

“I wouldn’t change myself for anybody. I am who I am, people accept me or they don’t. I have my strengths and my weaknesses which I can try to improve upon, of course. I’m still not the finished product. I’m only 24 so I’ve got plenty of time to keep improving.”

【now.com體育】被國際足協判罰停賽1年的前阿仙奴後衛伊保爾，聲稱曾因此浮現輕生的念頭。

伊保爾（Emmanuel Eboue）自與加拉塔沙雷解約後，長達半年多沒有球會落班，至今年3月與新特蘭簽約，以為可以再次捲土重來，怎料竟因拖欠前經理人費用，被國際足協判罰停賽1年，要明年3月才可回歸。近日接受《電訊報》專訪時，他坦言自己想過自殺。

「事發後有好幾天，我都不想離開自己的床。有一天，我想自殺，但我的家人使我繼續堅強活下去，因為我要考慮他們的感受。如果是我自己一個人，我恐怕已經做了傻事。」這位前兵工廠右閘說。

此外，伊保爾也感謝不少前隊友曾致電鼓勵他，唯一對現時效力些路迪的高路托尼，沒有慰問他有所微言：「當高路托尼曾因藥檢不合格停賽半年時，我經常和他說話。我知道他在些路迪遇到難題，所以明白他的苦處，不想說他壞話，我們是兄弟，希望他有一天會再找我，只是現在感到有點沮喪。」

前利物浦中場列納，早前曾在節目中公開談到伊保爾，表示雖然認識對方不算深，但這位前科特迪瓦國腳經常傳短訊向他傳教，使他後悔給了對方電話號碼。

【now.com體育】阿仙奴球員原定籌辦聖誕派對，卻因周日在聯賽作客受挫於曼城，決定取消這個慶節活動。

據《鏡報》指，阿仙奴陣中的領袖級球員，包括老將施治及隊長哥斯尼等，都認為球隊在周日被曼城所敗，現落後榜首球隊車路士9分後，不適宜高調開P，以免予外間不良好的印象。

據悉，個別球員都會相約外出用膳或飲酒，但不會像去年般到倫敦著名夜店打扮得身光頸靚，高調開聖誕P。不過，球員仍然如常趁聖誕快車展開前，在球會訓練營與一班小球迷見面及玩遊戲歡度佳節。至於奧斯爾、基奧特、比利連及阿歷士張伯倫也相約球迷慶祝，但不屬於球會官方活動。

周日城兵戰，阿仙奴雖然先由翼鋒禾確特接應阿歷斯山齊士的妙傳，於上半場5分鐘迅速打開紀錄，不過曼城藉利萊辛尼與史達寧下半場先後建功，終主場2:1反勝。兵工廠輸波後17戰得34分，落後車路士9分排第4。

on if players returning changes how he views January window…

Of course, because we have Lucas, we have Giroud, we have Alexis, we have Welbeck, Walcott, Oxlade-Chamberlain, who is nearly a striker. So we have plenty of options offensively.

on his defensive options…

Defensively, we are not in the need at the moment.

on fixture scheduling…

It’s a bit surprising this year because I don’t completely understand the organisation of the fixtures this season. Last week, after the Champions League, we played two games so that’s three games a week. This week we have eight days without a game. After that, some teams play on the 26th and the 1st so they have a complete week’s break over Christmas which is unusual. Then suddenly you play on the 1st and then the 3rd, just 48 hours later. I don’t whether it’s the television companies or the Premier League who have decided that, but it’s completely unusual. It looks less congested than it did before.

on what he will do on Christmas Day…

We will practise. At night we go to the hotel to prepare for the 26th.

on whether he will switch off at all on Christmas Day…

No. Like every manager, I suffer when we don’t win a game. In your mind you always have your next game. When you play on the 26th, it’s a game of a big importance and you know that you can’t switch off.

on the implications of Oscar moving to China…

Yeah, it’s a surprise. It’s a distortion. When you’re a football player, you want to combine the quality of the competition with the quality of your wages - and the quantity. It is a surprise to me, but I must say that when I was in Japan, they had many Brazilian players like Leonardo, Jorginho, Dunga. At the time they were big players and moved over there. The competition was well organised and was of top quality. I don’t really know well but at the moment I think Oscar moves because he doesn’t play in the Premier League. China gives him that opportunity, and as well they invest a lot of money at the moment to create a big force. Will it be a problem for the Premier League in the future? It could become one.

臨近聖誕，麥當勞宣布今日（12月24日）起加價，13款食品或飲品加價5角至1元。年頭宣布加價的麥當勞，今年在12月底第二度加價。其中細薯條由5元加至6元，加幅高達20%；今年初未有加價、原為10元的魚柳包、麥香雞包及豬柳蛋漢堡亦將加至11元，加幅為10%；3款原為23元的超值套餐加至24元，與2012年的「廿蚊餐」比較，4年間加價兩成。麥當勞今次整體平均加幅為2.5%，較年初的2.3%加幅微升。
